Text: I hear Aujean's "Angel \n Deluxe" is perfect for \n that.
Our customers \n are all gone!
As if it's my fault...
Gladly!
We told you not to \n let them see who you \n really were.
Your ice cream isn't \n even any good.
You're nothin' \n but a curse. \n Go away!
What do you know!? \n Keep your big nose out \n of our business!
Y-You've got some nerve!
Who, me?
Hey, you're scaring the \n other customers.
Oh, I'll bring it and \n bring some more!
Come on, bring it!

And so, Aujean's ice cream store 
 experienced a meteoric rise to fame and 
 a meteoric fall back to mediocrity in a 
 single day...
Y'all better stay in \n line. Angel's promise.
Hey guys, someone's \n pretendin' to be Kali!
Who does she think she \n is! She doesn't even \n look like her.
Guess I have to make \n 'em listen to my boot.
Y-You?
And they're a danger \n to the other customers.
Nothing like a little \n ice cream to help cool a \n hot head.
They aren't gonna \n listen to reason.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable pretending to be Kali...

Uh-oh, it's Aujean 
 and Eugie. 
 I should just pretend 
 I didn't see them.
Kat! Glad you came by \n when you did!
Try this, it's my latest \n product.
Ice cream! And on the \n house? Thank you.
Good, huh?
Well, it's alright.
I've got big plans for \n my ice cream stand!
I want my store to be \n known in every corner \n of Hekseville.
I know the flavor's \n fine, but I need a \n little marketin'.
We want you to be our \n campaign girl.
I'm not sure \n I want to...
Then pay us back for \n that ice cream you \n just ate.

What!? If I'd have 
 known... You expect me 
 to work for a cone of 
 ice cream?
Come on, with your \n appeal, we're bound to \n hit the big time.
You're the only one that \n can do this!
Did Aujean actually \n just praise me for \n once?
So, what would I need \n to do to market your \n stand?
Change into this \n and we'll talk.
But I can't get out of it now...
Get 50 People's Attention and \n Advertise the Ice Cream
Townsperson: \n I want what Kali's having!
Townsperson: \n Me too! I want what she's eating.
Wait... Why am I \n dressed up like Kali!?
Nobody knows who the \n Gravity Queen is \n anymore.
If you're not famous, \n you won't do us much \n good.

We need you to wear that 
 costume and advertise 
 our new flavor, "Angel 
 Deluxe."
Get people's attention, \n then give 'em a show of \n eatin' it.
If people think Kali \n likes it, they'll come \n flockin' to us.
Just try to keep your \n distance. No shiftin', \n got it?
If they think this is a \n scam, we're done for.
And don't forget, \n ice cream melts.
You've gotta sell \n it before it goes \n to waste.
Nothing good can \n ever come of helping \n these two...
Well, how was I?
You're just gettin' \n started is how.
Head someplace more \n crowded next!
You mean I've gotta \n keep doing this?
We need a huge line! \n Get some eyes on us.
Once we have the line, \n the rest will fall into \n place.
That's how trends \n are born.
I guess so...
Kali! Oh, uh, I can \n explain...
Are you copying my \n style? Oh, Gravity \n Queen...
Well, you see, I've got \n a job and, uh-

You've got a job 
 pretending to be me? 
 This just keeps getting 
 more interesting.
But I can't stick around \n to hear about it. I've \n got a show to star in.
A show!? You're going on \n a show?
Of course, silly. I'm on \n all the time.
Later, Copy Kat!
Wow, look at that line!
Using Kali to advertise \n the ice cream stand was \n a stroke of genius.
My genius!
Your genius, but my \n legwork!
You two are-
What was that sound?
Hey, you better check it \n out! Could be trouble.
We can't let anyone ruin \n our good fortune.
Next up is the train station.
Kali: \n Is that you, Kat?
Copy Kat!?
Aww man, this is all Aujean and Eugie's fault.

Nice! I've got a huge crowd going.
